questions.question: Angular acceleration of input link rotating with a constant angular velocity is ?

answers.d: can not be determined without link length

questions.question: Which amongst the following are not defined in case of a rotating link?
Tangential Acceleration at a point on a link is not proportional to ?

answers.c: Radial distance to the point of the link

questions.question: Centripetal Acceleration at a point on a link does not depend on ?

answers.b: Radial distance to the point on the link

questions.question: Tangential Acceleration at a point on a link ?

answers.c: is at 45<sup>o</sup> to the link in the direction of motion

questions.question: Which of the following is not true in case of centripetal acceleration?

answers.a: Its magnitude depends on the angular velocity of the link
answers.b: It passes through the center of rotation
answers.c: It is parallel to the link
answers.d: It is perpendicular to the link
